DOC.brief_summary: The objective study investigate whether intake diet high content butyrate ( dairy fat ) affect blood FIAF concentration compare control diet . Further examine whether high intake inulin ( prebiotic ) increase proportion butyrate-producing bacteria gut thereby affect blood FIAF concentration . In addition , correlation FIAF blood concentration rest energy expenditure , blood lipid profile gut microbiota composition investigate . Furthermore , study investigate whether source FIAF determine . To end , adipose tissue biopsy analyze vitro experiment fecal water sample carry . The study crossover randomize control trial 3 arm . Each arm duration 3 week . 20 overweight/obese subject enrol study randomize order intervention . Before intervention period , blood sample collect participant rest metabolic rate measure . At end intervention period , participant collect feces 5 consecutive day . In addition , adipose tissue biopsy take intervention period .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Dairy Fat Inulin Fasting Induced Adipose Factor ( FIAF ) Blood Concentrations
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Age : 2345 BMI : 2532 kg/m2 Body fat percentage ( BFP ) > 25 Chronic disease ( know diabetes , cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) , Intestinal Bowel Disease chronic disease likely affect result present study ) Milk allergy/lactose intolerance Intolerance towards inulin Fasting glucose ≥7.0 mmol/l nonfasting glucose ≥ 11 mmol/l* Use antibiotics 2 month commencement study Use dietary supplement incl . multivitamin runin entire study period Smoking Elite athlete ( > 10 hour strenuous physical activity per week ) Use prescription medicine could affect result present study , include systemic glucocorticoid Use lipidlowering agent medication contraindication high fat diet Blood pressure > 140/90 mmHg Blood donation < 1 month study commencement study period Simultaneous participation clinical study Inability , physically mentally , comply procedure require study protocol , evaluate study staff
